member.name: T:ICU4N.Globalization.ICURegionDataTableProvider
member.summary:
The data table provider for region/country data that is read from embedded resources inside of this assembly.
The data must reside in an embedded resource in a folder named Impl\Data\lang\ within the assembly, so it is resolved as [assembly name].Impl.Data.lang.[localeID].res.

member.name: P:ICU4N.Globalization.ICURegionDataTableProvider.Instance
member.summary: The singleton instance of the region/country data table provider.
